lesson1.title: Basic Greetings
lesson1.description: Learn common greetings in the target language.

questions.prompt: How do you say 'Hello' in the target language?
questions.explanation: 'Hola' is the standard greeting in Spanish, equivalent to 'Hello' in English.

questions.prompt: Translate 'Good morning' to the target language.
questions.explanation: 'Buenos días' literally means 'good days' and is used as a morning greeting in Spanish.

questions.prompt: How would you say 'Goodbye' in the target language?
questions.explanation: 'Adiós' is the most common way to say goodbye in Spanish, although there are other variants like 'Hasta luego' (see you later).

lesson2.title: Basic Phrases
lesson2.description: Learn essential phrases for basic communication.

questions.prompt: How do you say 'Please' in the target language?
questions.explanation: 'Por favor' is used to say 'please' in Spanish, showing politeness in requests.

questions.prompt: Translate 'Thank you' to the target language.
questions.explanation: 'Gracias' is the standard way to say 'thank you' in Spanish.

questions.prompt: How would you ask 'How are you?' in the target language?
questions.explanation: '¿Cómo estás?' is a common way to ask 'How are you?' in Spanish. Note the inverted question marks at the beginning of the sentence.
